content.text:
# Space Battleship Yamato: Iscandar e no Tsuioku

| platform = PlayStation 2
| modes = Single-player, multiplayer
}}
is the first game in the PS2 trilogy of Space Battleship Yamato games.

* [https://web.archive.org/web/20080930022807/http://yamato.channel.or.jp/ps2/ Bandai's site for its series of Space Battleship Yamato games for the Playstation 2]
